changeSet.author: aarustamov
changeSet.comment: Add new GC template to prodlims.GCTemplate table to support SNV Sendout Phase 0
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`GCTemplate` (`name`, `text`) VALUES ('SNV Sendout Phase 0', '

Dear Dr. [MD name],

\n

 

\n

Sincerely,

\n

 

\n

Natera, Inc.

');
changeSet.rollback: DELETE FROM `prodlims`.`GCTemplate` WHERE name = 'SNV Sendout Phase 0';
